ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I deliberately did not say anything about scamming, despite the poster saying they had contacted the EQ help line and been told all the keys were the
ygData.messageBody:
Thunder Cat wrote:
> Here we go again, insulting people who ask for help. Maybe she
> honestly didn't know that all of the CD keys were different, but it
> is assumed that she is trying to scam people out of their accounts.

I deliberately did not say anything about scamming, despite the poster
saying they had contacted the 'EQ help line' and been told all the keys
were the same...

> Second off, old accounts can NOT be reactivated just like that.
> EverQuest holds onto your unused and unpaid for accounts for six
> months before deleting it.

No, they guarantee they won't delete accounts for 6 months, but they
have never yet actually deleted an inactive account. I know of several
people who have returned after a year or more and just reactivated their
account.

Matt
